name: Thri-kreen Predator
text: Some thri-kreen fully hone their natural physiology, turning their bodies into weapons deadlier than the gythka. They strengthen their extra arms for making claw attacks, practice graceful jumps with their powerful legs, and augment their natural venom so it is potent enough to take down tough prey. Because of their battle prowess, these kreen often become the strongest members of their packs. It is the thri-kreen way to challenge weaker leaders, and the greatest hunters rise to positions of leadership.

features.leapIntoAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can make an Athletics check to jump as a free action either before or after your extra action
features.strongClaws(11thLevel): You gain a climb speed equal to half your speed
features.entrappingPack(16thLevel): You flank an enemy as long as both you and a nonadjacent ally are adjacent to the enemy

flavorText: My clutchmates and I, we learned to hunt to survive. In these days, I hunt those who speak and think. But I must do so, for I must survive.
